document_data.name: Meremoth
document_data.mainbody: '''Meremoth''' was an [[undead]] [[lamia]] who lived in the royal keep of [[Nornglast]] in [[Eskorn]], [[Laerakond]], and a high-ranking member of the [[Eminence of Araunt]] in the late years of the 15th century [[DR]].
document_data.History:
Meromoth started as a high-ranking member of the Eminence, the only other member equal to [[Lod]] in power and influence within the organization.

As the only other high-ranking member of the Eminence,
